table.name: TBZA_CODE
table.creation: CREATE TABLE TBZA_CODE( MAIN_CODE varchar(20) NOT NULL, SUB_CODE varchar(20) NOT NULL, VALUE varchar(20) NOT NULL, ORDER_NO int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (MAIN_CODE, SUB_CODE) )

defaultValue.query: insert into TBZA_CODE(MAIN_CODE, SUB_CODE, VALUE, ORDER_NO) values('ROOT','MM_COST','투입인력별 단가 ','1')
